paper_abstract: We derive here the Friedland-Tverberg inequality for positive hyperbolic polynomials. This inequality is applied to give lower bounds for the number of matchings in r-regular bipartite graphs. It is shown that some of these bounds are asymptotically sharp. We improve the known lower bound for the three-dimensional monomer-dimer entropy.
paper_title: Lower bounds for partial matchings in regular bipartite graphs and applications to the monomer-dimer entropy
